list.abs: tree bearing pear shaped fruit with a thick woody epicarp ., 有梨状果实的树 , 有厚厚的木本的外果皮.
Ephynal　一种维生素 Ｅ制剂的商品名epicarp　外果皮-

hesperidium ( pl.hesperidia ) A type of berry with a leathery epicarp , as in oranges and lemons . each carpel forms a segment of the fruit , filled with fluid-filled trichomes , See berry .柑果（橙果)：是一种具有坚韧外果皮的浆果，如橙子和柠檬。每一个心皮形成果实的一部分，心皮内充满肉质多汁的腺毛，参见berry。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the epicarp
